Disclosure Requirement E1-5 – Energy consumption and mix
35. The undertaking shall provide information on its energy consumption and mix.
36. The objective of this Disclosure Requirement is to provide an understanding of the undertaking’s
total energy consumption in absolute value, improvement in energy efficiency, exposure to coal,
oil and gas-related activities, and the share of renewable energy in its overall energy mix.
